name: @flightradar24/fr24sdk
description: Official node.js SDK for Flightradar24 API
author: Flightradar24

scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm
scripts.build:esm: esbuild src/index.js --platform=node --bundle --format=esm --outfile=dist/index.mjs --banner:js="import { createRequire } from 'module'; const require = createRequire(import.meta.url);"
